about_the_game:
The Special Ninjutsu: An Elder Reborn Kage Pack includes the following content:
- Special Ninjutsu - The Piercing One-Fingered Thrust of Hell
- Special Ninjutsu - Flying Raijin Slice
- Special Ninjutsu - Steam Imp
- Special Ninjutsu - Particle Style: Atomic Dismantling Jutsu - Pillar
- Special Ninjutsu - Magnet Style: Gold Dust Great Burial
- Special Ninjutsu - Wood Style: Wood Golem Jutsu
- Moonlight Scroll x10

This Special Ninjutsu Pack unlocks new ninjutsu for your avatar including ninjutsu used by the elder Kage!

Moonlight Scrolls can be appraised at the Ninja Tools Shop to unlock new costumes, weapons, ninja tools, and more!

*Includes products that are also sold individually. Be careful of duplicate purchases.
*Once you purchase the bundle, items can be claimed from the Gift Box at the Inn.
*Moonlight Scroll x10 will be automatically received in-game. Moonlight Scrolls are consumable items and will be used via the in-game Appraisal feature.
detailed_description:
The Special Ninjutsu: An Elder Reborn Kage Pack includes the following content:
- Special Ninjutsu - The Piercing One-Fingered Thrust of Hell
- Special Ninjutsu - Flying Raijin Slice
- Special Ninjutsu - Steam Imp
- Special Ninjutsu - Particle Style: Atomic Dismantling Jutsu - Pillar
- Special Ninjutsu - Magnet Style: Gold Dust Great Burial
- Special Ninjutsu - Wood Style: Wood Golem Jutsu
- Moonlight Scroll x10

This Special Ninjutsu Pack unlocks new ninjutsu for your avatar including ninjutsu used by the elder Kage!

Moonlight Scrolls can be appraised at the Ninja Tools Shop to unlock new costumes, weapons, ninja tools, and more!

*Includes products that are also sold individually. Be careful of duplicate purchases.
*Once you purchase the bundle, items can be claimed from the Gift Box at the Inn.
*Moonlight Scroll x10 will be automatically received in-game. Moonlight Scrolls are consumable items and will be used via the in-game Appraisal feature.

short_description: The Special Ninjutsu: An Elder Reborn Kage Pack includes the following content: 6 Special Ninjutsus (The Piercing One-Fingered Thrust of Hell, Atomic Dismantling Jutsu - Pillar, Gold Dust Great Burial, Wood Golem Jutsu) and Moonlight Scroll x10.
